title.rendered: How to find the closest gas station to your location

content.rendered:
we will explain how to find the closest gas station to your location, and we are going to do it using Google Maps. In the app store of your mobile you can find all kinds of specific applications for this function, but taking into account that Google Maps is already installed in most of them, we are going to focus on it instead of making you download other apps and exposing yourself to them being able to Collect the moves you make.

Google has been implementing searches and detours to gas stations in its maps application for a few years now, and finding the closest ones is as easy as making the precise search and organizing the results by distance.

13 TRICKS to get the MAX out of GOOGLE MAPS

Nearby gas stations with Google Maps

Google Maps incorporates the list of gas stations directly into its database, so to find them it is enough to do a generic search. To do this, open the app and click on the search bar that you have at the top.

As for the terms that you have to write, nothing intricate is necessary, since the generic “Petrol Stations” is enough, which, on the other hand, is the one that Google itself recommends. Therefore, write the word gas stations in the search engine of Maps. If you want to search for a specific one or a franchise instead of all of them in general, you can also add a name afterwards, but the recommended thing is simply gas stations.

After searching for the term Gas Stations, Google Maps will show you all the ones near your location, and a list will appear below so you can enter the profiles of each one or directly establish a route to go or call. However, this list will come sorted by relevance, so to see the closest Click on the Sort by option. that appears above under the term you have searched for.

When you click on Sort by, a window will appear at the bottom of the screen. In it you will see that the Relevance option is selected, and what you have to do is click on the Distance option which appears as a button next to it in that bottom window.

And once you click on the option to sort them by distance, A list of gas stations will appear in which you will first see the closest ones from your current location, as you go down you will see the distant ones. Also, on the map above you will see a visualization of all of them so you can get an idea of ​​where they fall.
